discussion.title: Multidimensional data
discussion.body: I want to use PySR in a dataset, but instead of using just one variable (ie. $f(x) = x^2$) I want to use 2 variable to make a 3 dimensional analysis (ie. $f(x,y) = x^2+y^2$). Has anyone have done enything similar?

nodes.body: Not sure I understand. PySR natively supports multiple input features - see the README example. But maybe you mean something else?
